attributes.action: Stop homophobic discrimination by teachers and educators.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In the United Kingdom, disgracefully, there are more and more situations where Gay, Lesbian, Bisexual and Transgendered children, are being treated unfairly or harshly by teaching staff. I implore the government, to ensure, that suitable training programmes are compulsory to new and current teachers, to deal with this problem.
